alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 9:19PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall will impact portions of northwestern Frontier, south central Lincoln and northeastern Hayes Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 917 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall extending from near Wellfleet to 12 miles west of Curtis. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Very heavy rainfall, winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Very heavy rainfall may lead to localized flooding. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Maywood. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 40 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
